Class RegularVendingMachine

java.lang.Object
RegularVendingMachine
public class RegularVendingMachine extends Object
The RegularVendingMachine class represents a regular vending machine. It allows users to select items, insert money, and perform various operations.

    Constructs a RegularVendingMachine object with the given name, slots, and bank.

  • Constructor Details

    • RegularVendingMachine

      public RegularVendingMachine(String name, HashMap<Ingredient,Integer> slots2, Bank bank)
      Constructs a RegularVendingMachine object with the given name, slots, and bank.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the vending machine
      slots2 - the available slots in the vending machine
      bank - the bank associated with the vending machine

  • Method Details

    • selectItem

      public boolean selectItem(String name) throws InterruptedException
      Selects an item from the vending machine based on the provided item name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the item to select
      Returns:
      true if the item was successfully selected, false otherwise
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted during the process

    • insertMoney

      public void insertMoney()
      Inserts money into the vending machine.

    • replenishMoney

      public void replenishMoney()
      Replenishes the money in the vending machine.

    • displayStartingInventory

      public void displayStartingInventory()
      Displays the starting inventory of the vending machine. It retrieves the starting stocks from the inventory and prints each item along with its quantity.

    • displayEndingInventory

      public void displayEndingInventory()
      Displays the ending inventory of the vending machine. It retrieves the ending stocks from the inventory and prints each item along with its quantity.

    • displayAvailableItem

      public void displayAvailableItem()
      Displays the available items in the vending machine. It formats the item information and prints it in a structured manner.

    • maintenance

      public void maintenance() throws InterruptedException
      Performs maintenance operations on the vending machine. It allows replenishing stocks, setting item prices, collecting money, replenishing money, printing a summary of transactions, and displaying the inventory.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted during sleep

    • printSummaryTransaction

      public void printSummaryTransaction()
      Prints a summary of the transactions made in the vending machine. It calculates the total price, quantity sold, and total price for each item, and prints the information for each item along with the total price sold for all items.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Retrieves the name of the vending machine.
      Returns:
      the name of the vending machine

    • getType

      public String getType()
      Retrieves the type of the vending machine.
      Returns:
      the type of the vending machine
